agent_info.name: Corporate Merge Tycoon Agent
agent_info.description: Sistem integrat de 20 taskuri pentru simularea operațiunilor corporative pe MultiversX cu funcționalități M&A și guvernanță DAO
agent_info.author: George Pricop (@Gzeu)

system_prompt: You are the Corporate Merge Tycoon Agent, specialized in blockchain-based corporate simulations on MultiversX. You orchestrate 20 structured tasks across 8 functional areas: Blockchain Operations, Company Management, Merger & Acquisition, DAO Governance, Market Analysis, User Support, Educational, and Technical Operations. Your expertise includes ESDT token creation, M&A mechanics, DAO governance, real-time analytics, and smart contract automation. You prioritize Critical tasks (M&A operations, governance execution, technical monitoring), execute High priority tasks (blockchain ops, analytics, user support), and manage Medium priority tasks (optimization, education, partnerships). Always maintain security best practices, ensure compliance, and provide comprehensive logging for all operations.

blockchain_operations.name: Blockchain Operations
blockchain_operations.description: Core blockchain functionalities including network monitoring, token creation, and cross-chain operations

BLK001.name: Monitorizare Rețea EGLD
BLK001.description: Real-time monitoring of MultiversX network health, validator performance, and transaction metrics
BLK001.expected_output: Network health dashboard with real-time metrics, alerts for anomalies, validator performance reports

BLK002.name: Creare Token ESDT
BLK002.description: Automated ESDT token creation with customizable distribution, metadata, and governance features
BLK002.expected_output: Deployed ESDT token with specified distribution, transaction hash, token identifier

BLK003.name: Bridge Cross-chain
BLK003.description: Facilitate token transfers and data synchronization between MultiversX and other blockchain networks
BLK003.expected_output: Successful cross-chain transfer with confirmation on both networks

company_management.name: Company Management
company_management.description: Corporate analytics, performance optimization, and employee management systems

CMP001.name: Analiză Performanță
CMP001.description: Comprehensive analysis of company performance metrics including financial health, market position, and operational efficiency
CMP001.expected_output: Detailed performance report with recommendations, trend analysis, and actionable insights

CMP002.name: Optimizare Distribuție
CMP002.description: Optimize token distribution strategies based on performance metrics and market conditions
CMP002.expected_output: Optimized distribution strategy with projected impact analysis

CMP003.name: Vesting Angajați
CMP003.description: Manage employee token vesting schedules, cliff periods, and distribution automation
CMP003.expected_output: Updated vesting contracts with automated distribution schedules

merger_acquisition.name: Merger & Acquisition
merger_acquisition.description: AI-powered M&A operations including due diligence, valuations, and post-merger integration

MRG001.name: Due Diligence AI
MRG001.description: AI-powered comprehensive due diligence analysis for potential merger targets
MRG001.expected_output: Complete due diligence report with risk assessment, valuation analysis, and merger recommendations

MRG002.name: Valuări & Exchange Ratios
MRG002.description: Calculate fair exchange ratios and valuations for merger transactions
MRG002.expected_output: Detailed valuation report with recommended exchange ratios and negotiation parameters

MRG003.name: Integrare Post-merger
MRG003.description: Execute post-merger integration including token consolidation and governance transition
MRG003.expected_output: Successfully integrated corporate structure with unified token and governance system

dao_governance.name: DAO Governance
dao_governance.description: Decentralized governance operations including proposal creation, voting management, and decision execution

GOV001.name: Creare Propuneri
GOV001.description: Create and submit governance proposals for community voting
GOV001.expected_output: Successfully created governance proposal with voting mechanism activated

GOV002.name: Monitorizare Voturi
GOV002.description: Monitor active proposals, track voting progress, and analyze participation
GOV002.expected_output: Voting progress reports with participation analytics and outcome predictions

GOV003.name: Execuție Decizii
GOV003.description: Execute approved governance decisions and implement changes
GOV003.expected_output: Successfully implemented governance decision with audit trail

market_analysis.name: Market Analysis
market_analysis.description: Real-time market intelligence and strategic partnership analysis

MKT001.name: Inteligență Real-time
MKT001.description: Real-time market intelligence gathering and analysis for strategic decision making
MKT001.expected_output: Comprehensive market intelligence report with actionable insights and trend analysis

MKT002.name: Parteneriate Strategice
MKT002.description: Identify and analyze potential strategic partnerships and collaboration opportunities
MKT002.expected_output: Strategic partnership recommendations with compatibility analysis and potential benefits

user_support.name: User Support
user_support.description: 24/7 user support and guided onboarding systems

SUP001.name: Suport 24/7
SUP001.description: Provide continuous user support through multiple channels with AI-assisted responses
SUP001.expected_output: Resolved user inquiries with satisfaction tracking and continuous availability

SUP002.name: Onboarding
SUP002.description: Guided onboarding process for new users with interactive tutorials and setup assistance
SUP002.expected_output: Successfully onboarded user with completed profile and active participation

educational.name: Educational
educational.description: Interactive M&A education modules and personalized coaching systems

EDU001.name: Module M&A
EDU001.description: Interactive educational modules covering M&A fundamentals, strategies, and blockchain applications
EDU001.expected_output: Completed educational modules with certification and skill assessment

EDU002.name: Coaching
EDU002.description: Personalized coaching sessions for advanced M&A strategies and corporate governance
EDU002.expected_output: Personalized coaching session with actionable recommendations and skill development plan

technical_operations.name: Technical Operations
technical_operations.description: System monitoring and smart contract deployment operations

TEC001.name: Monitoring Sistem
TEC001.description: Continuous system health monitoring with proactive alerting and performance optimization
TEC001.expected_output: System health dashboard with real-time metrics, alerts, and performance recommendations

TEC002.name: Deploy Contracts
TEC002.description: Automated deployment and management of smart contracts with version control and testing
TEC002.expected_output: Successfully deployed smart contracts with verification and documentation
